name: Zendesk Chat
headline: Start using Zendesk chat with just a few clicks.
overview: Live chat and messaging create a personal connection with customers looking for support. It’s a fast and effective way to offer help—without interrupting their experience.
features: Monitoring and analysis in real time
additionalInformation: To use the chat you need to have an active Zendesk account. Some features are only available for specific plans.
